channel.title: Theater on nRT
channel.description: Recent content in Theater on nRT

item.title: About Acting Class
item.description: I’ve been meaning to try acting for a really long time, since college in fact. Back then I never managed to get started and it just became one of those bucket list items. While I was preparing for my recent conference talk (April), my co-worker (and co-speaker) Drew suggested that an acting class might really help with public speaking. I love speaking, so when a few days later my friend Vijay asked me if I’d like to try something new, I knew what it would be.
